utils

Class UserFileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.UserFileUtils

  • public class UserFileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines methods for writing a Problem object to a XML file (writeToXML) and constructing a Problem object from a XML file (readFromXML). The XML file must obey a determined structure for these methods to apply.
    Author:
    Ana Pestana

    • Method Detail

      • writeToXML

        public static void writeToXML(Problem problem,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String fileName)
        Method to write a given Problem object to a XML file according to a determined hierarchical structure
        Parameters:
        problem - object you want to write on the XML file
        path - for the directory in which to store the XML File

      • readFromXML

        public static Problem readFromXML(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method to read and construct a Problem object from a XML file document compliant with a determined hierarchical structure
        Parameters:
        filePath - for the directory containing the XML file
        Returns:
        resulting Problem object
